snippet: An anemic Mets offense took advantage of Marlins closer Steve Cishek and some poor defense to turn a 3-1 deficit in the ninth into a thrilling win over Miami.
abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Mets defeat Miami Marlins, 5-3; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: An anemic Mets offense took advantage of Marlins closer Steve Cishek and some poor defense to turn a 3-1 deficit in the ninth into a thrilling win over Miami.

headline.main: Ninth-Inning Rally Sends Mets Past Marlins
headline.print_headline: With Four Runs in Ninth, Mets Turn Back the Marlins
